mapper.select: select count(1) from (select fwbs,ffbs,warn_type,warn_name,nvl(sum(warn_value),0) as warn_value from config_warn_count where warn_type in ('RISK-RT','RISK-ERR','RISK-MIS') and substr(create_time,0,10) >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and substr(create_time,0,10) <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by fwbs,ffbs,warn_type,warn_name) t left join fwzyffzcb a on t.fwbs=a.fwbs and t.ffbs=a.ffbs left join fwzyzcb b on a.fwbs=b.fwbs left join fwcyfzcb c on b.fwtgz_yyxtbh=c.fwcyf_yyxtbh where 1 = 1 and c.fwcyf_yyxtmc like '%${yymc}%' and b.fwmc like '%${fwmc}%' and a.ffmc like '%${ffmc}%' and t.warn_type = #{warnType}

select t.warn_type as type,t.warn_name as name,substr(t.create_time,0,13) as time, nvl(sum(t.warn_value),0) as value,substr(t.create_time,0,13)||'-'||t.warn_type as key from CONFIG_WARN_COUNT t left join fwzyffzcb a on t.fwbs=a.fwbs and t.ffbs=a.ffbs left join fwzyzcb b on a.fwbs=b.fwbs left join fwcyfzcb c on b.fwtgz_yyxtbh=c.fwcyf_yyxtbh where substr(t.create_time,0,10) >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and substr(t.create_time,0,10) <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.warn_type in ('RISK-RT', 'RISK-ERR', 'RISK-MIS') and c.fwcyf_yyxtbh = #{yybs} and b.fwbs = #{fwbs} and a.ffbs = #{ffbs} group by t.warn_type,t.warn_name,substr(t.create_time,0,13) order by substr(t.create_time,0,13)

select count(1) from (select fwbs,ffbs,warn_type,warn_name,sum(warn_value) as warn_value from config_warn_count where warn_type in ('WARN-FRE','WARN-KEY') and substr(create_time,0,10) = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by fwbs,ffbs,warn_type,warn_name) t left join fwzyffzcb a on t.fwbs=a.fwbs and t.ffbs=a.ffbs left join fwzyzcb b on a.fwbs=b.fwbs left join fwcyfzcb c on b.fwtgz_yyxtbh=c.fwcyf_yyxtbh where 1 = 1 and c.fwcyf_yyxtmc like '%${yymc}%' and b.fwmc like '%${fwmc}%' and a.ffmc like '%${ffmc}%' and t.warn_type = #{warnType}
select count(1) from config_warn_count t where status='0'

select c.fwcyf_yyxtbh as yybs,c.fwcyf_yyxtmc as yymc,b.fwbs,b.fwmc, a.ffbs,a.ffmc,a.ffms,t.warn_type,t.warn_name,t.warn_value,t.create_time from config_warn_count t left join fwzyffzcb a on t.fwbs=a.fwbs and t.ffbs=a.ffbs left join fwzyzcb b on a.fwbs=b.fwbs left join fwcyfzcb c on b.fwtgz_yyxtbh=c.fwcyf_yyxtbh where status = '0' order by t.create_time desc
select count(1) from config_warn_count t where status = '0'

select t.ffqqz,t.tjrq_hour as hour,t.ffqqz||'-'||t.tjrq_hour as key, nvl(sum(t.num),0) as value,f.fwcyf_yyxtmc as name from TJ_FWQQJGRY t left join fwcyfzcb f on t.ffqqz=f.fwcyf_yyxtbh where t.tjrq_date=#{time} and t.ffqqz = #{yybs} group by t.tjrq_hour,t.ffqqz,f.fwcyf_yyxtmc order by to_number(t.tjrq_hour)

select t.ffqqz,t.tjrq_hour as hour,t.ffqqz||'-'||t.tjrq_hour as key, sum(t.num) as value,f.fwcyf_yyxtmc as name from TJ_FWQQJGRY t left join fwcyfzcb f on t.ffqqz=f.fwcyf_yyxtbh where t.tjrq_date=#{time} and t.ffqqz = #{yybs} group by t.tjrq_hour,t.ffqqz,f.fwcyf_yyxtmc order by to_number(t.tjrq_hour)

select count(1) from (select fwbs,ffbs,warn_type,warn_name,nvl(sum(warn_value),0) as warn_value from config_warn_count where warn_type in ('WARN-FRE','WARN-KEY') and substr(create_time,0,10) >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and substr(create_time,0,10) <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by fwbs,ffbs,warn_type,warn_name) t left join fwzyffzcb a on t.fwbs=a.fwbs and t.ffbs=a.ffbs left join fwzyzcb b on a.fwbs=b.fwbs left join fwcyfzcb c on b.fwtgz_yyxtbh=c.fwcyf_yyxtbh where 1 = 1 and c.fwcyf_yyxtmc like '%${yymc}%' and b.fwmc like '%${fwmc}%' and a.ffmc like '%${ffmc}%' and t.warn_type = #{warnType}
